IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: VILLA ACADEMY IS AN INDEPENDENT CATHOLIC SCHOOL SERVING GRADES PRESCHOOL THROUGH EIGHTH GRADE, DEDICATED TO EXCELLENCE IN THE EDUCATION OF THE WHOLE CHILD.
IRS990.MissionDesc: VILLA ACADEMY IS A CATHOLIC INDEPENDENT SCHOOL DEDICATED TO EXCELLENCE IN THE EDUCATION OF THE WHOLE CHILD AND GUIDED BY THE CABRINIAN TRADITION OF EDUCATING COMPASSIONATE HEARTS AND CONFIDENT MINDS.
IRS990.Desc: NOT FOR PROFIT COEDUCATIONAL CATHOLIC SCHOOL PRESCHOOL TO 8TH GRADE OPEN TO ALL ON A NONDISCRIMINATORY BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: grant expense netted with revenue on the financial statements
Grant expense netted with revenue on the financial statements
To provide income for tuition assistance to qualified students
ANNUALLY PUBLISHED NON-DISCRIMINATION STATEMENT THROUGH OUR MEMBERSHIP WITH THE NORTHWEST ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT SCHOOLS (NWAIS).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part I Description of Procedure for Monitoring Use of Funds
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Financial Aid Committee (consisting of the Head of School, Business Manager & Admissions Director) awards financial aid (FA) annually based on student need. Families complete the Personal Financial Statement (PFS) on the School & Student Services (SSS) website (www.sss.nais.org). Individual reports are then provided by SSS to the school.
NAIS SURVEY USED TO COMPARE TO OTHER HEADS OF SCHOOL. BOARD DETERMINES COMPENSATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMMITTEE MEETING MINUTES TAKEN DURING COMMITTEE MEETINGS, SUBMITTED FOR APPROVAL/CHANGES AT THE FOLLOWING COMMITTEE MEETING (EXCEPTION IS EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE, WHICH DOES NOT KEEP MEETING MINUTES).

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REVIEWED BY THE BUSINESS DIRECTOR WITH THE HEAD OF SCHOOL AND THE BOARD TREASURER; ALSO REVIEWED BY THE FINANCE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: POLICY IS INCLUDED IN THE FACULTY/STAFF HANDBOOK AND ALL EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO SIGN ACKNOWLEDGEMENT OF RECEIPT OF THIS DOCUMENT. BOARD MEMBERS COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST FORM ANNUALLY. SHOULD A CONFLICT-OF-INTEREST ISSUE ARISE, EMPLOYEES AND/OR TRUSTEES ARE REQUIRED TO INFORM THE BOARD CHAIR OR APPROPRIATE PERSON AS SOON AS POSSIBLE; RESPONSIVE ACTION WOULD BE DETERMINED AFTER ALL INFORMATION WAS GATHERED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HEAD OF SCHOOL'S COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD CHAIR, WHO NEGOTIATES THIS EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD. COMPENSATION FOR OTHER KEY EMPLOYEES OF THE SCHOOL IS DETERMINED BY THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IN CONJUNCTION WITH COMPARISON DATA AND THE BOARD TREASURER WITH THE FINANCE COMITTEE AS A PART OF THE ANNUAL BUDGET PROCESS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THESE DOCUMENTS ARE NOT MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC.
